external_games.name: The Bard's Quest: Dungeons of the Unknown

name: The Bard's Quest: Dungeons of the Unknown
summary: This is a NEW VGA/MCGA 256-color RPG game from VisionSoft! You must unravel the secrets of the mysterious dungeons of Isil Thania and discover the ancient Star Light Cult! So real you'll be playing for hours!
